titleStmt.title: The gluttons feauer. VVritten by Thomas Bancroft
titleStmt.author: Bancroft, Thomas, fl. 1633-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Norton, for William Cooke, and are to be sold at his shop, at Furniuals-Inne gate, in Holborne,
